description: We <3 Tara because she is deceptive. You think when this glamorous girl walks in that she is not going to take what we dish out, and every time she amazes and impresses me. Tara endures a challenging squatting throne position, metal pile driver spread with a double fisting, and a cruel metal sybian ride. In every position she is completely isolated unable to move an inch. The only thing she can do is suffer. Watch her ordeal as it unfolds in a live format with no forgiveness, just relentless pain, bondage, and orgasms... just how we like it.
title: Tara Lynn Foxx - Complete Edited Live Show
